section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Ridesharing" has the meaning stated in § 11-150.1 of the Transportation Article.
"Vanpool operation" has the meaning stated in § 11-175.1(a) of the Transportation Article.

text.section:
This section applies only with respect to a vanpool operation in which the vehicle:
is leased, operated, or owned by an employer for ridesharing;
operates between the residence and place of employment of the passengers; and
is insured in accordance with § 13-422 of the Transportation Article.
An individual is a covered employee while operating a vehicle in a vanpool operation as part of the duties of the individual for the employer.
A passenger in a vanpool operation is not a covered employee.
